You finally go outside. A bunch of kids wouldn't be launching fireworks, would they? As you step out the door, drowsiness falls over you. It is hard to describe, but it feels as if everything around you is dying out...

BANG! Another firework shakes you awake. You frantically look back and forth at the swirling blue lights around you. Blue dust seems to be falling over the town, and your energy takes a nose dive.

Get as far from here as you canTry to figure out what's going on
